title: US hospitals brace for potential Omicron surge in January
content:
1. US hospitals brace for potential Omicron surge in January  The Guardian
  2. CDC chief says omicron cases expected to grow, White House remains 'confident' schools will stay open  Fox News
  3. New York Area Bears the Brunt of Omicron on Top of Delta  Bloomberg
  4. What makes omicron spread so quickly? A new study offers a tantalizing clue : Goats and Soda  NPR
  5. What we know about the severity of omicron and possibility of 'triple whammy' this winter  PBS NewsHour
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
